Claim: "A man in a black cap is swinging with some children."
Implication: "A man in a black hat is swinging with some children."
Referring expressions: A man in a black cap, some children
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInBlackCap(b) and IsSwingingWithChildren(a))) & (forall e (forall d ( IsInBlackHat(d) ->  IsInBlackCap(e))))) -> (exists a (IsInBlackHat(a) and (IsSwingingWithChildren(a) or IsChildren(a))))
